ゾンビゲームの原点！神ゲーです

I wanted to post this because for a while now, I am finding myself to be very addicted to this game.

I wasn't a gamer in the past, and have never experienced gaming addiction before.

Nowadays, I rarely leave me house other than work, after work I instantly login, checking up on my friends and forum, doing matches, even just standing around doing absolutely nothing. I'm always on the game, and the game is always in the back of my head.

Even at work I find myself unfocused, which I wasn't like prior to playing L4D, I'm always worrying about my character and the game and aching to get home and just play for hours upon hours into the dead of the night where I barely get a wink of sleep before going back to work, I even try and skip work and make excuses for myself, which I can't afford to do.

Real life relationships have been deteriorating, loads of my friends and family try and come over and spend time with me, and as a previously very sociable and warm person I'd invite them in, get them some food, or a drink and sit and chat and be a very good attendant. These days if anyone comes they are a nuisance to me, I'm just aching for them to go so I can get back on my game.

My relationship has ended because she got sick of me eventually and said I was beyond help, I just ignored her, someone who was so precious to me, and I just didn't treat her the way she deserved and now she's gone and I have no one to blame other than myself.

I rarely answer text messages or phone calls and ditch my friends at work, people are always messaging me with genuine concern and I blow them all off.

I've spend hundreds on hundreds of dollars into the game, and continue to do so, the game has become such a huge priority that I feel like I'm not in control of my life anymore.

I've tried going cold turkey, tried playing less, nothing seems to work. I just have an urge to get on and login. My online friends are taking priority of my real life friendships that have lasted years, and even my family and it's not okay.

I just wanted to post this because I hope someone can relate to me, and share their experiences and I want to let them know they aren't alone.

I hope that I can finally regain control of my life and not let this game control it anymore
Um dos melhores jogos que já joguei

Игра отличная, потресающая графика на те времена, геймплей - ИДЕАЛЬНЫЙ. 

По скидке 40 рублей стоит такой ШЕДЕВР, ну как можна не купить????

For a game from over a decade now, Left 4 Dead has really stood the test of time with it's fluid fast paced game design, an interesting backstory behind the green flu infection across the eastern United States. Great survivor characters, and the different strains of special infected you can either fend against or play as in versus mode. (Psst, L4D2's versus is more active and fleshed out compared to this one). I'd say it's so worth picking up this game if you haven't already. Even in 2019, 2020, and further on.
sempre bom voltar a este joguete maravilindo... melhor com os amiguinhos, lógico!
Jogo antigo, porém garante muitas horas de desafios e diversão, quando mais evoluímos,  muito maís queremos jogar.
Неплохая игра даже сейчас,повспоминать 12-тые года очень даже приятно.Минус только один - дефицит игроков на данный момент, а так всё зашибись
Vlastně ani s nástupem dvojky jsem ji nikdy neodinstaloval...:)
Bill might be old but he ain't horseshitting with some boomers

Bem vamos lá, Left 4 Dead, aonde começo a série de jogos de fps de 4 pessoas? 

[h1] História [/h1]

Tudo começo com um vírus que se espalhou rápido, e 2 semanas depois (momento que se passa o inicio do jogo, eu acho) você conhece 4 personagens imunes ao vírus (Motoqueiro: Francis, Gerente: Louis, Garota Jovem: Zoey e Ex-atirador velho (Baby Boomer): Bill)

[h1] Gameplay [/h1]

Jogo de FPS, com arminhas, zumbis e muita violência oh yeah! (Não tem muito o que falar, é mesma coisa da análise do l4d2)

[h1] Trilha Sonora [/h1]

Mesma análise do 2, da uma olhada lá depois

[h1] Nota Final [/h1]

Mesma do 2 da.... brincadeira 16/20

O jogo que começou tudo, mesmo que o seu sucessor seja mais famoso e jogado, o 1 é uma ótima compra, não vai se arrepender
Muito bom, mais não vale a pena pois existe left 4 dead 2. Eu amo esse aqui mais esta morto.

Awesome, fun game even at the end of 2019. Great teamwork-based game.

If you like explosions, fast pace action, and mowing down hoards of zombies with your machine gun, then this is the game for you. This is a great game to play on your own or with your friends, with the in game campaigns plus player made add-on campaigns you and your friends will be playing for hours on end. I highly recommend getting this game, it is one of the best purchases I have made.
Até hoje continua sendo uma das melhores experiências de multiplayer cooperativo da história. Diversão é a palavra que resume o que é lef 4 dead. Jogo obrigatório para quem tem amigos.
